member.name: T:Tic_Tac_Toe.TicTacToe
member.summary: Program is a game of simple tic tac toe

member.name: M:Tic_Tac_Toe.TicTacToe.CheckWin
member.summary: Checks if anyone has won, it is checked after every turn
member.returns: a 1 is someone has won, returns -1 if its a draw, 0 is no one has one

member.name: M:Tic_Tac_Toe.TicTacToe.CheckDraw
member.summary: method that checks if there is a draw
member.returns: bool stating whether there is a draw or not
